then try different wording then because you may not like urf but a hell of a lot of people do, self included and the reason why would most likely be the large amount of senseless fun we can all have in one game. 

sure in one for all you can ult the same person 5 times with the same ult, 
in poro king you get to throw freaking poros around, 
ascension everything about you gets stronger if you get that buff, 
and nexus siege brings true defense/offense into the game but what is one of the most basic mechanics of the game? 

cool down is one of the reasons this game is what it is and every champ has some form of a long cool down and then riot gave us a game mode that allowed us the ability to cast our favorite abilities on our favorite champs fast then you ever could in any other game mode and this is why this game mode every single time it is up causes the log in queues to clog up, it is amazing how such a simple change can attract so many people back to a game they already love and yet it does time and time again urf has been show to be the most loved game mode that riot has ever created. yes i know i can't speak for everyone but i don't have to, much like how riot does i can let numbers speak for themselves. even if i haven't change your mind about it, even if "It's a terrible game mode that is a waste of time and is so terribly unbalanced that it is worthless to play." we still wait with excitement in our eyes i don't know why because all it really is is a small change to a large game yet we just can't seem too let it go.

so think about that the next time you say things like "I don't want urf." because there is a hell of a lot of people out there that do.
